item.title: Tor4dummies
item.description: TOR # Tor is a privacy centred browser with the aim to bypass sensorship and making your browsing traffic private. It works by routing your traffic through 3 different nodes(servers/computers) run by volunteers all over the world.This makes it hard for a tracking agent to really know what you are upto online. An intresting fact about tor,is this is where you can access the infamous dark net.You can identify a dark net site with .
